metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40281 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Samsung TizenRT through 3.0_GBM (and 3.1_PRE). cyassl_connect_step2 in curl/vtls/cyassl.c has a missing X509_free after SSL_get_peer_certificate, leading to information disclosure.

notes.Note: alexmurray> 0ad contains a vendored copy of curl with this same code/function

criterions.comment: 0ad package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
